page.title: 06VILLAGE LIFE - SOUTH LINCS
page.content: Part of the hamlet of Scottlethorpe on the A151 Bourne to Colsterworth road comprises two farms and several houses occupied by agricultural employees or retired persons.The one child living here attends school in Bourne three miles away. The amenities are very limited.There is no public transport through the village, no library service, post-box or street-lamps. Papers, milk and post are delivered daily and the postman will collect mail if required. There is mains water, mains drainage and electricity, but no gas.
